title: The Sims Medieval + Pirates & Nobles updated repack Mr DJ
description:
The Sims Medieval + Pirates and Nobles Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Repack features:
- Interface languages is English ;
- Final game version: 2.0.113.00001(latest);
- Precracked - install and play;
- Install Time - 10 minutes [Quad core]
- Final Size: 5.59gb
- Registry: Yes
- Operating System: Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit)

Contents:

-The Sims Medieval (Base  Game)
-The Sims Medieval: Pirates and Nobles

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
